about.subtitle: ABOUT THE AFFILIATE PROGRAM
about.title: About the Affiliate Program
about.description: CIRCULUS offers a unique opportunity for you to generate extra income by selling ready-made websites for service providers in Angola. We are pioneers in creating accessible digital solutions.

benefit1.title: 100% Online
benefit1.description: Work from anywhere at any time, without having to leave home.

benefit2.title: Weekly Payments
benefit2.description: Receive your commissions every week, directly into your account.

benefit3.title: No Experience Needed
benefit3.description: We provide all the training and materials for you to start immediately.

commissions.subtitle: ATTRACTIVE COMPENSATION
commissions.title: Commission Table
commissions.description: Earn generous commissions for each sale made and substantially increase your income

premiumPackage.name: Premium Package
premiumPackage.description: Exclusive website with integrations and premium features

commissions.earningsDescription: By becoming a CIRCULUS affiliate, your earning potential is virtually unlimited. Our most active affiliates achieve consistent and progressive income month after month.

feature1.title: No Earnings Cap
feature1.description: There is no limit to the number of clients you can refer

feature2.title: Progressive Commissions
feature2.description: The more you sell, the higher your percentage commissions

feature3.title: Weekly Payments
feature3.description: Receive your commissions every week by bank transfer or pix

calculator.subtitle: CALCULATE NOW
calculator.title: How Much Can I Earn?
calculator.description: Use our calculator to simulate your earnings as a CIRCULUS affiliate
calculator.tip1: Increase your level and earn higher commissions

howItWorks.subtitle: SIMPLIFIED PROCESS
howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.description: A simple 4-step process to start earning your commissions and transform your time into income

step1.title: Sign Up
step1.description: Fill out the registration form and join the CIRCULUS affiliate program.

step2.title: Receive Materials
step2.description: Access all promotional materials and training to start your sales.

step3.title: Sell with your Link
step3.description: Share your personalized link or affiliate code with potential customers.

step4.title: Receive Commission
step4.description: After payment confirmation, receive your commission directly into your account.

faq.subtitle: FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS
faq.title: Answers to Your Questions
faq.description: Everything you need to know to start your journey as a CIRCULUS affiliate
faq.question1: How does the affiliate program work?
faq.answer1: You sign up for free, receive your affiliate link or code, promote the products, and earn commissions for each sale made through your referral.
faq.question2: How much can I earn as an affiliate?
faq.answer2: Earnings depend on your effort and promotional strategy. We have affiliates generating from 150,000 Kz to over 1,000,000 Kz per month.
faq.answer3: No! We provide all the necessary training, materials, and support for you to start selling even without previous experience.
faq.question4: How do I receive my payments?
faq.answer4: Payments are made weekly via bank transfer or other methods available in Angola.
faq.question5: Do I need to have a website to be an affiliate?
faq.answer5: It's not mandatory. You can promote through social networks, WhatsApp, email marketing, or any other channel you prefer.
faq.question6: Is there a fee to participate in the program?
faq.answer6: No, registration in the CIRCULUS affiliate program is completely free.

registration.subtitle: JOIN US
registration.title: Become an Affiliate

registration.privacyPolicy: By submitting, you agree to our Privacy Policy
registration.successMessage: We have received your registration. We will contact you soon via WhatsApp for the next steps.
registration.errorMessage: An error occurred while submitting your registration. Please try again or contact our support.

footer.aboutText: CIRCULUS is a pioneering company in digital solutions for service providers in Angola, focusing on ready-made websites and digital marketing.
